In the future, it is important to focus on strengthening the existing legal system and ensuring that it upholds justice for all individuals. This can be achieved through reforms, greater transparency, and improved access to justice.

If you have any specific concerns or questions related to this topic, I am here to help provide information and guidance within the boundaries of the law.
